title: Stop with the YASUO buff he is broken
body:
Just because bronze players cant play him and make his win rate look bad does not mean the champ is underpowered and needs buffs. HE IS BROKEN NOW. Any player beyond the skill of a bronze 5 gets 2 kills with him the game is over. He already has the strongest basic ability in the game and retarded amount of crit dmg and you keep buffing him? The new items were a buff to yas not a nerf he did not need extra help. Learn to balance your damn game. you already ruined botlane making it so bruisers are more viable in bot than adcs and u go and buff the most cancer champ in the game who was already buffed from the adc changes??? 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: I feel like Yas is just too damn forgiving with his kit. Like he does take some form of skill... but once someone does have some skill to play him you are screwed.

I think the worst time I've EVER seen Yas was when i ended lane 1/8, I fed and fed HARD!!! I was so far behind and i thought i threw the whole game, no one else did anything either. I then got 2 fucking items, got caught in the jungle, then 1v4 quadra. like REALLY, WTF is that?!?!? That should NOT be a thing!!! i SUCK at yas, he's one of my worst champs... and i can still 1v4 quad, he's just kinds BS...
